text: aap kah den ki ye saty hai, tumhaare paalanahaar kee or se, to jo chaahe, eemaan laaye aur jo chaahe kufr kare, nishchay hamane atyaachaariyon ke lie aisee agni taiyaar kar rakhee hai, jisakee praacheer[1] ne unhen gher liya hai aur yadi ve jal ke lie guhaar karenge, to unhen tel kee talachhat ke samaan jal diya jaayega, jo mukhon ko bhoon dega, vah kya hee bura pey hai aur vah kya hee bura vishraam sthaan hai
